text: (napiye! Am'makkalitam)"kalnataikalil ettu vakaikal ullana - cem'mari attil (an, pen) iru vakai, vellattil (an, pen) iru vakai, avan (allah) an irantaiyum haramakki vittana? Allatu pettai irantaiyum haramakki vittana? Allatu avviru vakaikalilumulla penkalin karppankalil ullavarraiya (avan tatuttirukkiran?) Ninkal unmai kurupavarkalaka iruntal, (itanai) atarattutan enakku ariviyunkal" enru ketpiraka
